text: Hello Lucy ! How you doing ? :slightly_smiling_face: I haven't been in touch with you for a while because I have my deadlines these days, maybe you would like too see my FX project ? I  still want to improve it but I had to submit it atleast for my briefs, so I am planning to do it during christmas :sweat_smile:  Also I wanted to ask you maybe you know what kind of shots fx junior artist gets to work on ? Because I know that junior compositors doing mostly Roto Paint so it's really important to show that knowledge in your showreel
